title: American Horseman-Sportologue
additional-note: A 1974 renewal for 'Fundamentals of Horsemanship' by Louise Evelyn Walraven mentions that portions of the book were previously published in American Horseman-Sportologue, but the CCE entry does not give dates for those publications.   (The CCE entry also spells 'Sportologue' as 'Sportslogue'.) The renewal could conceivably renew copyrights for articles in that magazine as early as 1946, but we have not verified whether it did.
